last_episode_to_air.name: Grimoria's Return
last_episode_to_air.overview: Sophia's good intentions lead to catastrophic events. Now the fate of Unicorn Island depends on the Sapphires — and the one test they dare not fail.

name: Unicorn Academy
overview: When a dark force threatens to destroy Unicorn Island, a brave teen and her five schoolmates must rise up to protect their beloved magical academy.

episodes.name: Unicorn Academy
episodes.overview: At Unicorn Academy, regular teen Sophia has a lot to learn about fantastical creatures, but a dark force threatens to return and destroy unicorn magic!

episodes.name: The Hidden Temple
episodes.overview: While riding the Skyberry Trail, Wildstar gets spooked by grim magic, sending the group racing to a long-forgotten temple full of mysteries — and danger.

episodes.name: The Race
episodes.overview: Miss Primrose accelerates the students' training by sending them to an advanced obstacle course. But will competition get in the way?

episodes.name: The Book of Grim
episodes.overview: To learn more about grim magic, Sophia, Ava and Layla sneak into the library after hours to borrow a restricted book that proves to be too powerful.

episodes.name: Under Starglow Lake
episodes.overview: When grim magic contaminates the academy's water supply, the unicorns risk losing their power unless Sophia can save Starglow Lake with an unlikely ally.

episodes.name: The Vision Pool
episodes.overview: Eager to decode the message from the Whispering Willows, Sophia skips party planning to visit the Vision Pool — right after promising Ava she wouldn't.

episodes.name: The Broken Gem
episodes.overview: The Sapphires try everything to get Sophia and Ava to stop fighting, but they've got bigger problems: Two dastardly henchmen are after the grimstone.

episodes.name: Ravenzella's Revenge
episodes.overview: As the academy teachers gear up to battle a powerful foe, they forbid their students from leaving the dorms. But one rider doesn't follow the rules.

episodes.name: Mended Hearts
episodes.overview: Without the help of their teachers, the students must work together to take on the evil Ravenzella all by themselves. Unicorn Academy depends on it!

episodes.name: Under the Fairy Moon
episodes.overview: While gathering starburst flowers for the Fairy Moon ball, an accident breaks Isabel's trust in River, allowing a mysterious stranger to step in.

episodes.name: Year of the Unicorn
episodes.overview: On a Sapphire camping trip, a constellation that only appears every five years sends a special surprise down to Earth. But something troubles Wildstar...

episodes.name: Star Showers
episodes.overview: Ava throws a party for a foal that's been causing chaos around campus while Sophia investigates her father's connection to the Unicorn Constellation.

episodes.name: Wildstar's Dream
episodes.overview: Using a sleepover at the stables as their cover, the Sapphires sneak out in search of the crown stars. But they're not the only ones looking.

episodes.name: Legacies
episodes.overview: A legendary unicorn rider visits campus, stirring tensions between Sophia and Valentina. Layla gets jealous when Glacier reunites with an old friend.

episodes.name: Mounting Pressure
episodes.overview: Ms. Wildwood tasks the Sapphires with keeping wild unicorns safe from a volcano, which Sophia uses as an opportunity to search for another crown star.

episodes.name: The Wrong Crowd
episodes.overview: Sophia races to Starglow Lake to battle the Star Snatcher for the last crown star. Back at the dorms, Rory tries out for a secret society of pranksters.

episodes.name: The Final Test (1)
episodes.overview: For their final test, the students must infiltrate ogre-guarded ruins and rescue a hostage before the last bell rings... or risk immediate expulsion.

episodes.name: The Final Test (2)
episodes.overview: Working together unlocks a new bond for the Sapphire riders — and with it, new abilities. Then, Valentina comes clean to Sophia about the crown stars.

episodes.name: Grimoria's Return
episodes.overview: Sophia's good intentions lead to catastrophic events. Now the fate of Unicorn Island depends on the Sapphires — and the one test they dare not fail.
